type: Tutorial Step - A Note On Keys and Tokens!

definition.text: Let me make a quick pause to point out something important regarding the safety of your keys and tokens...

paragraphs.text: Superalgos stores the workspace file that contains your keys and tokens in the JSON formatâ€”unencrypted. In this state, this crucial information is as safe as your computer may be.

Never share your workspace file AS IS. To share a workspace, use the Share button on the menu. It creates a share-safe copy of the workspace, stripped of sensitive information by removing the APIs hierarchy and the Exchange Accounts section of the Crypto Exchange node.
